Bill Heidemann

Position: Mayor Email: Bill.Heidemann@council.corinthtx.gov

Term Expires: May 2026 Elected Mayor in May 2015 Appointed to Council Place II in November 2014

Mayor Heidemann is a retired business manager and is currently employed by DATCU. He is a graduate of the University of Wisconsin-Stout. He received a Bachelor of Science degree before attending graduate school at the University of Wisconsin-Stout and Columbia University.

Mayor Heidemann's focus is on serving the City of Corinth by promoting innovation and preserving the quality of life for the residents of Corinth through planned growth and development and continued communication with the community. Along with his current service as the Mayor, Mr. Heidemann serves as a board member of the Corinth Finance Audit Committee, the Chairman of the Crime Control and Prevention District, the Fire Control, Prevention, and Emergency Services District, the Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 2 (TIRZ No. 2), and the Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone No. 3 (TIRZ No. 3). He also serves on the Board of Directors for the Lake Cities, Lake Cities Focus , the North Central Texas Council of Governments (NCTCOG), and the National League of Cities (NLC) Transportation and Infrastructure Services Committee.

City Council
